attributes.action: provide direct bus along derby ring road to Derby City Hospital
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Derby City Hospital is going to be the Main Super Hospital, IN 6 Months time, as the D.R.I. is scaling down.
People close to City Hospital,have to take 2 bus rides or Taxi`s which is expensive and time consuming.
We the Undersigned. request Direct Bus to run along Derby Ring Road from Alvaston, calling at Allenton along Osmaston Park Road calling at Cavendish on route to City Hospital.
This would make patients, visitors and staff from these areas able to take a Direct Transport Route. 
Saving time and Money and Carbon Footprint.
